column5: BZUN I know all of us longs have so much time and money invested in this its easy to be impatient What we all must remember is sometimes stocks and markets take a breath go sideways or retreat The noise is high right now and the market needs a breather after a huge run from December And China stocks out of favor right now with TW Build this into your core portfolio and know that in a while whether thats two weeks two months or two years this is the type of stock that can reward you with returns vastly superior to SP Thats all you need to remember Often even with volatile high growth stocks patience is required Its never a 100 free ride unless you get lucky with your exact timing because we all know TRYING to time a stock move is much harder than it looks
BZUN Hoping for some nice upgrades in the next while Fingers crossed that TW sentiment doesnt affect us this way however not surprised if it does
